item.description:
At the April and May meetings we discuss "The Universe in a Single Atom - The Convergence of Science and Spirituality" by His Holiness the Dalai Lama (Morgan Road Books, 2005). Through an examination of Darwinism and karma, quantum mechanics and philosophical insight in the nature of reality, neurobiology and the study of consciousness, the Dalai Lama draws significant parallels between contemplative and scientific examination of reality.

Tenzin Gyatso, His Holiness the Fourteenth Dalai Lama, is both the temporal and spiritual leader of the Tibetan people.
item.how_to_find_us: First floor - entrance on west (Commercial Street) side of the building.
